page.title: 02FUN AND GAMES
page.content: WE LIKE TO PLAY GAMES AT WEEKENDS, IN THE HOLIDAYS AND AT PLAYTIME IN SCHOOL. THERE ARE LOTS OF GAMES AND WE ALL KNOW THE RULES AND TEACH TEM TO NEW CHILDREN. SOME OF THE GAMES ARE PLAYED WITH BALLS OR ROPES AND SOME HAVE SONGS. THIS GAME CAN BE PLAYED BY LOTS OF CHILDREN..{................... {STUCK IN THE MUD.}ONE PERSON IS "IT" AND CHASES THE OTHERS. IF YOU ARECAUGHT YOU MUST STAND WITH YOUR LEGS APART AND ONE OF THE OTHER RUNNERS WILL TRY TO FREE YOU BY CRAWLING BETWEEN YOUR LEGS. THEN YOU CAN JOIN IN THE GAME AGAIN. THE GAME ENDS WHEN EVERYONE IS "STUCK" AND THERE IS NO ONE LEFT TO FREE THEM. OTHER GAMES AREBRITISH BULLDOGS,POLO,CAT ANDMOUSE, 40-40,MO0B SAVE ALL,BUMPER CAR AND DEAD LION. ALL THE GAMES ARE FUN TO PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS.
